content.detailedDescription: Saturday april 1, 2017, 7:00 am  my wife and i noticed an object was about two miles into the gulf of mexico from miramar beach, hovering vertical cylindrical type object emitting very bright white light, no sound, could not be a helicopter. it was initially hovering but moving slowly sw further out in the ocean and upwards to the sky. noticed an airplane above me far up in the sky, compared distance to object and object was definitely much much lower. could not figure out why there was not sound. it was not a helicopter, neither an airplane as it was hovering gradually moving up. was definitely not a balloon. bright light randomly flashing between bright white light and dim light, although still very bright. it progressively moved further out and far up into the sky, actually very fast and lost visual sighting after about a total sighting time of about 10 minutes to 15 minutes.
content.summary: Hovering vertical cylindrical type object flashing very bright light, no sound

content.detailedDescription: It was 1975, i was 12 years old living in ceder hill texas. ceder hill texas was not a populated area at the time, it had big open fields that me and my 2 closes friends would go to play. the day we saw the ufo we had finished playing and we were headed home, we stopped at the street corner that one of my friends lived on and i turned around to say bye, that's when i saw the ufo hovering just behind us up in the sky. my other friend and i were so scared that we took off running to our homes, her street was the next street down from mine. when i got to my street were i lived, i looked back behind me and the ufo was still there like it followed us. the ufo was metallic in color and made no noise what so ever, years latter i told my sister about what i had seen and she told me that her friend and her friend's family saw it that day as well.
content.summary: It was 1975 i was 12 years old, i looked up and saw a huge metallic cigar shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: We were traveling north on the i -10 frontage rd near vado nm around 9:15 when we saw what we thought was a stadium light on the west side of the road. it began to move rapidly to the south in a series of strobe like flashes. the flashes were bright but silent. they moved in a straight line. they moved abnormally fast, we could not even approximate the speed. i personally saw 4 flashes before the lights moved out of my line of vision (i was driving) and my husband saw 6. we estimated the object was less than 500 ft above the ground and was probably 1/2 mile or so from the rd. the light was silver colored, and had the effect of a strobe light. i am a skeptic, but this is the second unexplainable ariel event i have witnessed in the past 10 years.  our reaction to this event is one of disbelief and of course trying to find a logical explaination for the phenomenon.
content.summary: What appeared to be a stadium light started started to move rapidly to the south in a series of strobe like flashes

content.detailedDescription: Un amigo con que hablamos de ufo, me llama y me pregunta si estoy en mi casa y me dice que sobre el edificio donde vivo hay un ufo y bajo y veo y no veo nada sigo minando y nada camino mas y lo vi eran 3 naves alineadas en forma triangular, estaba sobre unas montañas y unos amigos estaban tomando mas o menos a 300 metros y los trate de llamar para q los vieran y no podía llamarlos estaba como paralizado por dentro y las naves tenían hueco por todos su alrededor  y tenían luces cada hueco en mi vida ya he visto 3 uno en mi liceo y otro desde mi casa y todos eran naves diferentes yo dibujo y las puedo dibujar me molesta que en mi pisa no tengamos instituciones que averigüen esto, la gran mayoría creer que no existen y están equivocados porque si existen
content.summary: Eran 3 naves circulares estaban alineadas en forma de triangulo y estaban sobre una montaña y cada nave tenia orificio por su arrededor y cada uno tenia luces ya en toda mi vida he visto 3 apariciones y cada una son naves diferentes se dibujar y los puedo

content.detailedDescription: Just taken these sunset photos while on a ferry home. the strange thing is a white object in the sky which on my last photo is no longer there. btw the moon is in the top right corner.
content.summary: Strange object above sydney bridge during sunset

content.detailedDescription:
What ever the case we have been visited frequently by craft since mercury liquid mercury spill occurred at this residenc.....Look it up on haz mat site..Anyhoo i keep  getting woke up with ideas of perpultion design...
then waking to see craft out my window,we ive above the town on hill.....Any hoo i keep getting reaccuring thought of;;;;
a gimbal spere ,looks like copper wrapped,,,,long story short inside the gimbal in the middle wrapped in a caseing ,,,,,a heatin source is the gimbal and the mercury is staionary in the middle as the heat directs the mercury in whic ever direction it is assumeed ,,i need professional hypnosis to get the information installed out ,,,i cannot explain what has been inputted in my head...Im just a simple man being visited frequently ,,,like they think i have mercury and they are trying to tell me what to do with it........Last year haz mat cleaned and tore house apart and dirt from liquid merc spill.....Then moved all contaminated material near las vegas......Since then and during ,,,,lot os sightings and thoughts of devices i would never think of ... im scared
tonight ass not my first sighting......It always arrives while i sleep but leaves and heads towards mt shasta
content.summary: Constant apperance for year since mercury spill at this address

content.detailedDescription: I was outside of my apartment building walking my dog.  i was just looking up at the starts and caught an object that looked like a dark brown, it may have been a bit transparent, perhaps cloaked.  i have never seen something like this object before and i had no idea what it was,  i was baffled and didn't really believe i was seeing it.  the object was moving at a steady speed from east to west around 5 mph or so..Under 10 mph.  it was completely silent and when it was over my apartment building it seemed to pause or for example when and object moves fast it leaves a tracer...Only way i can think to describe it.  and it paused 3 times that i saw and just kept moving on same path out of sight.  i had the feeling of not believing what i saw.  i thought perhaps it was some kind of remote controlled object maybe but it was completely silent and it made those strange movements/pauses while moving that made no sense to any kind of normal movements for aircraft or remote control toys.  i am still in disbelief.  i told my friends and of course they say it was a remote controlled object...I know it wasn't.  it had to have been around 30 feet wide, shaped like a boomerang but with more curves and some patterns and or windows on the body of it.  it was dark outside around 10:15 pm and quite honestly i did not believe what i saw, i was confused, i did not try to chase after it to look more after it passed over the building.  i just said out loud to myself "what the hell did i just see"?  the best i can describe the shape is kind of like a pterodactyl but without the head,feet and tail and it had patterns and or windows on it and was dead silent.
content.summary: This was a brown color and i barely noticed it.  it was moving around 5 mph and was silent.  it would hover for 1 second and continue moving, i saw it hover 3 times.

content.detailedDescription:
I arrived home in the late afternoon and after parking my car i noticed my mom and younger brothers looking out the kitchen window. i thought they were looking at me as i arrived home and waved to them. they did not wave back. i proceeded into the house and my mom said, "come here and look at at this". as i looked out of of dinning room window facing south on the horizon i saw what appeared to be a pair of headlights in in sky coming at me. as the lights reached the point where they appeared to be just a couple of blocks away (growing in brightness as they approached) they suddenly vanished. there was no profile of a airplane that had turned and the vanishing lights were abrupt.  my mom said, "look at the horizon". i did and there were the lights approaching again. i watched with my mom and siblings for twenty minutes as the "headlights in the sky" would travel in a straight line from the southern horizon near sac airforce base in bellevue nebraska north towards my house in millard nebraska for 20 minutes. as the lights traveled towards us they became brighter and when they appeared to be just a couple of blocks away they disappeared. as quick as i could move my eyes back to the southern horizon the lights were already there coming north towards us. when the lights disappeared there was no profile visible as though a plane had banked away. as quick as my eyes could go from the lights that had just disappeared to the southern horizon the lights were already visible coming north towards us. at no time could i shift my eyes from the disappearing light down the block to the southern horizon and "beat the light" to the horizon. that night on the local news (i believe the news anchor was gary kerr) it was reported that 5,000 people had witnessed the "lights in the sky" over southwest omaha. we never called in to report our sighting. 
i'm a 39 year veteran of law enforcement and currently the chief of  investigators  for a state attorney general's office.  this incident occurred between march 1969 and june of 197 and was reported locally by the news media.
content.summary: Observed "highlights in the sky flying in a straight line from strategic air command near  bellevue nebraska north to millard nebraska for 25 minutes reported by local tv station ketv channel 7 with 5,000 witnesses between march 18, 1969 and june 1971.

content.detailedDescription: Saw a lite over the pipeline went out on the porch saw a craft coming in from the north about treetop high the craft was about the size of a 747 no sound  greenish lite pointed  at the front wide at the back low and slow in area for about 8 minutes then 2 helicopters  came in from the east the craft them moved off rather fast to the south helicopters  followed the helicoptersame had no markings and made little  noise
content.summary: Came in from the north slow and low no sound pulsating greenish light to a white hovering over a pipeline stayed in area  for about 8 minutes then flew off to the south  when 2 unidentified helicopters flew in from the east

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside, looking over the dunes toward the ocean. i saw a glowing yellow ball slowly moving north after about 1 minute it eccelerated and disaperead. 
there was no sound, it was a very quiet night, no wind or clouds. i was not scared, or uneasy... just amazed as this was not explainable.
content.summary: I saw a slow mov8ng light over the ocean, that accelerated and disapeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was celebrating new years with my family and had stepped outside as it turned 2012 and with my brother and my cousins we witnessed a string of lights appear in the sky overhead the lights appeared in a flash and then dissappeared as they they came
content.summary: It was midnight 2012 when a  string of lights appeared in the sky my family and were outside and witnessed the lights hovering in the sky in a line formation

content.detailedDescription: I was coming out of a restaurant with a friend at about 9:00 pm on wednesday, april 26, 2017. i looked up in the sky and saw a chevron shaped craft with 7 white lights blinking all at the same time heading west. it was very clear and seemed too large to be an aircraft. i pointed it out to my friend. she thought it might be an airplane.  i thought it might be a drone at first glance. but it was too large and too high in altitude to be a drone, i think.  the object made no noise. it seemed to be well above 500 feet at about 80 degrees above the horizon when we first spotted it. the lights were much larger than the usual lights that appear on aircraft, and were brighter than typical aircraft lights.  it was moving slowly. then, when the craft was about 50 degrees above the horizon, the right side lights (3 of them) stopped shining, so that the craft appeared to be a straight line of 4 lights blinking all at the same time. i stopped looking at it when it was about 45 degrees above the horizon. i estimate that it took about 2 minutes to move from 80 degrees to 45 degrees. i really don't know what kind of craft it was, and didn't consider it to be a "ufo" at first. i was trying to figure it out, and am submitting my report in order to gain information, if possible.  i didn't lose sight of the craft. i just stopped looking at it.  after the event, i realized i may have viewed a possible ufo.  if i did, it is the first time i have witnessed one.
content.summary: Saw a chevron shaped object with 7 blinking white lights. then, the right side of the craft's lights stopped shining

content.detailedDescription:
Round object emitting various lights: red, yellow, green and blue. four witnesses. one witness brought a 10inch reflector telescope with high power magnifying capability. object appear to be stationary with flushing lights around. few commercial aircraft were in the area at the time of observation. i made three videos with my cell phone of this object.
we lost sight of the object when drifted away after 2 hours. location, oakville, ontario. date: 26apr, 2017 time 9:30pm
content.summary: Round object emitting various lights of different colors, red, yellow, green and blue

content.detailedDescription:
Over nelson co virginia tonight from 22:00 he's to current time of 23:40.
no offense meant to anyone that reads this. this report is made by initial observer but more importantly a huge skeptic..No offense folks. defiantly the coolest thing we've ever seen! 7 clearly light visible large objects in "orbit" with earth. in night sky tonight come off the last star in the handle of the little supper and look left. find orange star like celestial object. 6 more in sky like it. we all witnessed these objects go very bright, to dim to black-out. then repeating. no pattern or algorithm...Varies.
  lights stayed on after est. 40 minutes and are on and fixed at this time. my guess...Defense satellites in orbit to cover u.S.A. with n. korea acting up. i honestly can not identify nor can anyone else watching. pretty incredible night in va though!
this is a very credible report. would testify under oath!!!
content.summary: 7 objects, round like planets, not in our atmosphere. very large i.E. bomber size maybe larger. 10 witnesses est. event is still ongoing.

content.detailedDescription:
My dad and i were sitting on the back porch and saw something odd, first floating above the
house.  he got terribly excited, because he realized that we were seeing a true ufo event.
i was only 15 at the time, but noticed the object shoot, from the initial approximate height of about 100 feet straight up and away from the backyard to about 500 feet without any sound at all.  we hopped into his car to chase the object.  i remember that he called the police at the time.  he talked about it for the next year of his life; unfortunately, he died about 15 months later- he had his own private pilots license...Died at age 40 with my little brother aged 14.

at first, my dad thought that it was a weather balloon, but then realized that:
    wrong shape
     flew far too quickly and there was no wind that day
    couldn't catch up with the object even though we were speeding 

i realize that i am about 50 years late if i am the only one that reported it , but am interested to see if anyone else had reported it also...
content.summary: Reporting to see if others reported this

content.detailedDescription: Tonight my wife and i witnessed an object in the sky moving in an erratic, southern direction in greenville county, sc. it had brilliant white lights which strobed in a fast, random fashion. it was moving quickly but erratically, and made no noise at all. about halfway through the sighting, it appeared to move immediately backwards, midflight. the direction change was startling. then it resumed its southern direction. the object was dark and didn't seem to reflect any of the strobing lights. at one point, there seemed to be other flashing lights surrounding it, but they did not reappear. in all, the event lasted about 20-30 seconds. never seen anything like it before. confident that it didn't appear or behave like a meteor, satellite, or normal aircraft.
content.summary: Greenville, sc: strobe light ufo, moved fast, silent, abrupt direction change

content.detailedDescription: I sent pictures into mufon not too long ago, days i guess. i caught something stranger yesterday. it looks like lens flair at first but its not. these pics show what looks like a contrail missing a section right after that you see that shape with an inner ring that looks like it's sucking up where the missing of section of contrail was. another pic shows the object seeming solid in front of some clouds. pretty wild.
content.summary: Strange sky

content.detailedDescription: In 1972 i lived in las vegas, nevada.  i was a divorcee with 4 children.  a friend and i went up into this area by nellis a fb  and we're target practicing with soft feather darts.  we came in off another road and we hiked to a spot.  we heard a noise and went to investigate.  there in a fenced area was a huge ufo- it was surrounded by men with machine guns dressed in military uniforms.  (my friend told me they were machine guns as i would not know)  there were big lights on it the type you see on football fields.  he was a photographer -i want to say for the sun times but i'm not certain on this name.  he always had his camera with him and he shot pictures of it.  i remember asking where is this -it was in a metal fence enclosure and there were buildings there. he said this is back side of nellis afb- he was very excited -i was in shock -we went back how we came- and immediately went to his newspaper where he worked.  he called the head guy sorry cannot remember his name- he said we are going to run it on the first page.  we were there a long time and he gave me 3 copies of the newspaper with the picture of this ufo.  i don't recall how i got home i had called my sitter and said i'd be very late or early evening  morn.  the next morn i called my neighbor and asked her if she got the paper with ufo picture- she said there is no picture of any ufo -i said well i have 3 copies i'llc show you. when i went to get they were gone.  i called my friend it said #disconnected.  i called the paper the girl said no one there by that name.  i went to his apt it was empty!  i never heard from him again!  i was terrified and never told anyone -told my friend it was a dream.  but it was not!  i am 69 years old and even now have only told a handful of people.  it still scares me.  and worse i cannot remember his name!  in fact not long after some stuff faded from my mind. but never what i have written here.
content.summary: A ufo at nellis a fb, nevada

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on my patio at night. noticed object in sky that was out of place. no stars or planets in that direction. it appeared to hover over a large mountain (i know there is a mountain over that way). was visible for over an hour and simply disappeared. it reappeared on subsequent nights. but not since january. it was circular and at one point i asked for it to come closer, and it did. when it did it was only close enough for me to see the multitude of colored lights around the base. it was big. i was excited. i was abducted in 1989 so i wondered if these were the same aliens. my friend spotted the same craft in march 2017 over same mountain. we live in different areas of the city, but where she indicated her sight was the same area i saw the craft.
content.summary: On patio, see light to southwest that is hovering over a mountain. it was visible for over an hour then vanished. returned twice afterwards. no stars or planets in that direction. able to visualize different colored lights

content.detailedDescription: I usually sit out on my balcony in the evenings just to enjoy the breeze i'm just having to look up and notice an object going by it didn't leave a paper trail like most planes it seemed more like a comet or meteor it took me a moment to run back inside and grab my cell phone and try to take a couple of pictures i had to zoom in i also noticed a cargo plane flying by most likely from the air force base near me
content.summary: Whatever it was it seemed to glow and left a trail but not a vapor trail like most planes i always see those going by

content.detailedDescription: At balcony, napoli beach south of lima , all of a sudden four lights round yellow appeared stood still for 30 seconds, a small ball size yellow light showed up , a few seconds passed they rushed north at incredible speed.
content.summary: Suddenly appears before me 4 lights and a yellow light ball like followed behind then they took off

content.detailedDescription: It started when i had to have foot surgery they removed some great cottage cheese-like matter out of my heel then a month later remove the foreign object out of my foot lab results unknown. and as i was getting an mri they found another object in my foot but no scar tissue no entry wound no rejection from my body it's still in my foot. i've had numerous other strange happenings going on that very very sick after that was removed out of my foot. been doing research i read about rh negative blood which is my daughter's blood type. that was going through pictures on my computer and found one of me and behind my left shoulder there's clearly what looks to be a grey looking down through my ceiling at me. i will download the picture to see what you guys think. been trying to find answers you guys are my only hope.
content.summary: Forgien objects removed from my foot and still have one remaining

content.detailedDescription: I had just dropped my sons girlfriend off at work at 25th & post road. i was heading south on post road heading back home,i'm looking at the clouds wandering if it was going to rain when i saw a bright light come shooting out of a cloud it was flashing rappedly,i told my daughter to look at that and asked her if she knew what it was and she said she didn't know either,it went in to another cloud some distance away.Plane's don't go that fast. it was heading southeast.I didn't see it come out of the other cloud.
content.summary: Brite light flu from 1 cloud to another in just a couple of seconds

content.detailedDescription: Driving s on hwy 17. passing end of myrtle beach airport. observed small object come from end of runway over our car. fluttering sound observed by my wife and i. radio was on and windows open. loud.  was a flat black. looked like it was "fluttering"
content.summary: Driving s on hwy 17. passing end of myrtle beach airport. observed small object come from end of runway over our car. fluttering sound observed by my wife and i. radio was on and windows open. loud.  was a flat black. looked like it was "fluttering"

content.detailedDescription: These are my best photographs of a ufo near a passenger plane. i spotted this ufo checking out a virgin atlantic passenger plane. the ufo flew around the back of the virgin atlantic passenger plane before it moved off into the distance. i managed to take eight photographs that clearly show the movement of the ufo. these photographs are incredible and were taken with my sony hx300 camera. the photographs were taken on the 26th of august ‎2016 10:30 am gmt at newton abbot devon england
content.summary: Ufo checking out a virgin atlantic plane

content.detailedDescription:
Taking a morning walk, looked up saw an object very high travelling south, not along the normal flight path of aircraft.  the object was not visible when not flashing.  a second object was then seen flashing brightly but not as apparently large as the first and seemed to over take and then fall behind the first object.  the flashes were incredibly bright and not in a discernible pattern.  i observed that the sun was over my left shoulder and behind me and could not have been reflected back by an aircraft, and also noted that there were no clouds visible that could have caused intermittent illumination by the sun.

during the experience i attempted to understand how an aircraft could have produced those flashes, initially it looked like tumbling debris and i was concerned it might have been an aircraft having issues with control, and noted however there was no smoke or evidence of the two objects descending.  a weather balloon was also entertained however i could not surmise how it would produce two separate looking objects flashing out of sequence with each other.    i did go to the flight aware website to see if there were any aircraft travelling in the direction i noted they were moving, all aircraft over head were flying on the high altitude track taking them south west, not south to south east. 

the objects went out of sight approximately 30-45 degrees over the horizon.
content.summary: Saw two objects separated by a few degrees travelling south at very high altitude flashing brightly

content.detailedDescription: I was sky watching when i spotted what at first i thought was a plane, but when i zoomed in on the object i had quite a shock. i could clearly see that the object was in fact a flying saucer that was leaving a contrail as it moved across the sky. i quickly took a photograph of the flying saucer before it moved off into a cloud covered part of the sky. it was incredible i see these ufo all the time around here where are they coming from. i really want to know. newton abbot is definitely a hotspot for ufo activity. i truly wish that the british government would tell the truth about alien visitation in the uk. the photograph was taken on the 23rd of september ‎2016 at newton abbot devon england.
content.summary: Flying saucer leaving contrail

content.detailedDescription: I have witnessed and reported similar lights before. a dull light shaped sort of like a cigar first caught my attention.  i wasn't sure if i was looking at a plane leaving a trail, so i began to photograph it, and after uploading the photos to my computer i could see that there were three lights at first, and they eventually disappeared. it was getting dark, and i didn't have a tripod, so many of the photos were out of focus. i did manage to get a few decent photos. power lines were present and i feel that the lights were much further than the power lines, but i can't be positive about that. a short time later, two other lights appeared. i took video of the two lights and one light was traveling slowly and appeared to go through a power line, but that could have been because i was in full zoom and the camera was shaky and it may have made the light appear to do so. i had my camera set to photograph in raw which i hoped would have captured  good detail, but the lights seemed faraway and the photos were not of the greatest quality. even still, i believe that you can see that it is not an airplane, and in my opinion the lights didn't seem close to the power lines, but again i can't be sure. i contradict myself in saying that in viewing the video, the lights appear to be right at the power lines, but if that is the case the lights are a big as the power line are thick. i have converted the raw files to jpeg.
content.summary: I first witnessed a cigar shaped light. it eventually disappeared. i saw a few airplanes and i photographed one, a short time, after two more lights appeared that were not airplanes.

content.detailedDescription: I have an implant, who can i mail?
content.summary: I have an implant, help please.

content.detailedDescription: I have witnessed and reported similar lights before. a dull light shaped sort of like a cigar first caught my attention.  i wasn't sure if i was looking at a plane leaving a trail, so i began to photograph it, and after uploading the photos to my computer i could see that there were three lights at first, and they eventually disappeared. it was getting dark, and i didn't have a tripod, so many of the photos were out of focus. i did manage to get a few decent photos. power lines were present and i feel that the lights were much further than the power lines, but i can't be positive about that. a short time later, two other lights appeared. i took video of the two lights and one light was traveling slowly and appeared to go through a power line, but that could have been because i was in full zoom and the camera was shaky and it may have made the light appear to do so. i had my camera set to photograph in raw which i hoped would have captured  good detail, but the lights seemed faraway and the photos were not of the greatest quality. even still, i believe that you can see that it is not an airplane, and in my opinion the lights didn't seem close to the power lines, but again i can't be sure. i contradict myself in saying that in viewing the video, the lights appear to be right at the power lines, but if that is the case the lights are a big as the power line are thick. i have converted the raw files to jpeg.
content.summary: I first witnessed a cigar shaped light. it eventually disappeared. i saw a few airplanes and i photographed one, a short time, after two more lights appeared that were not airplanes.
